name: Hard Rainbow 4 Quiz / Test | Rainbow Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: Name the musician whose original back up group was the 'Blue Moon Boys'?
What was the name of the gang of girls in the movie 'Grease'?
What are the colors of the Swiss flag?
questions.explanation:
Red and White.

	A white cross on a red background.  The Red Cross symbol was derived from the Swiss flag.

questions.text: What color is the stripe on the 9 ball in pool?
What is the most common color of Topaz?
questions.explanation:
Yellow.

	Topaz can also be clear, blue or brown. Yellow Brazilian Topaz turns pink when exposed to moderate heat.

questions.text: What color is displayed on the starboard side of a boat or ship?
What color is the fragrant flower of the Kumquat tree?
questions.explanation:
White.

	It is sometimes described as as a white-orange like color.

questions.text: What color is the Golden Gate Bridge?
What color is the slowest Pac-man ghost?
What are the official colors of the Mardi Gras?
questions.explanation:
Purple, green, gold.

	King cakes are served during the feast of Epiphany to begin the season. These cakes are usually decorated with the Mardi Gras colors.
